reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's lectures are engaging and informative. She's always willing to help students outside of class.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant instructor! Prof. Chen makes complex algorithms easy to understand. His projects are challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson knows her subject well, but her lectures can be a bit dry. More interactive sessions would be helpful.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Martinez brings history to life with his storytelling. His exams are tough but fair.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Kim is an exceptional teacher. Her lab sessions are well-organized and she explains concepts clearly.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson seems knowledgeable, but he often moves too fast in lectures. More practice problems would be beneficial.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Brown's passion for literature is contagious. Her feedback on essays is always constructive and helpful.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Lee is a genius at explaining complex physics concepts. His demonstrations in class are unforgettable.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia's lectures are informative, but the workload can be overwhelming at times. More guidance on assignments would be appreciated.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Taylor relates economic theories to real-world situations effectively. His classes are always thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. White's enthusiasm for art is infectious. Her virtual museum tours are a highlight of the course.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Green knows his subject well, but sometimes struggles to remain impartial during discussions on controversial topics.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Chen makes language study fascinating. Her assignments are creative and encourage critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Brown's Socratic method of teaching is incredibly effective. He challenges students to think deeply about complex issues.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Lee's field trips are excellent learning experiences. She effectively links theory to practical environmental issues.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Prof. Smith's lectures are often disorganized. More real-world case studies would improve the course.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Rodriguez is at the forefront of her field. Her lectures are challenging but incredibly rewarding.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. Park's practical approach to music theory is refreshing. His composition assignments are both fun and educational.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's research experience adds depth to her teachings, but sometimes her lectures can be hard to follow.

reviews.subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review: Prof. Lee's hands-on approach to teaching engineering is excellent. His projects prepare students well for industry work.
